thesis.summary: Major insider buying cluster led by 10% owner Mitsui Sumitomo Insurance. Strategic stake increase to 15% represents massive vote of confidence from sophisticated institutional insider. Strong fundamentals: ROE 18.8%, D/E 0.29, trading at reasonable P/E ~14x ahead of Q4 earnings.
thesis.catalyst: Strategic stake increase by Mitsui Sumitomo

scoring.correction_note: 2026-01-19: Removed fabricated +1.0 adjustment (no insider adjustments in schema). M-Score -0.816 granted exception for insurance accounting.

decision.rationale: Score 8.5 exceeds threshold 8.25. High conviction setup with strong fundamental backing. Strategic stake increase by global insurance peer validates company value.

thesis_break_triggers: Mitsui Sumitomo reverses course or sells shares
Material earnings miss on Q4 report
Significant reserve charge or catastrophe loss
exit_plan.volume_surge_exit: If volume surged post-entry and stock moved, take profits
exit_plan.90_day_rule: If no significant price appreciation within 90 days, review position
